data.decision: API rate limit is 100 requests per minute, not 1000. Always use 100/min in code and documentation.
data.rationale: Production incident on 2026-02-10: Service crashed when we assumed 1000/min limit. The actual limit from the provider is 100/min. Confirmed via API docs and support ticket #4521.
alternatives: Requested limit increase (denied - enterprise tier only)
data.context: A developer assumed the API allowed 1000 requests/minute based on outdated docs. In production, we hit rate limiting at 100/min, causing cascade failures. Support confirmed the 100/min limit is correct.
